adrFormatAddress: 222 Broadway, New York, NY 10038, USA

originalText.text: Pollfish provides an estimate as to how long it will take for the survey to be completed. I am not sure how the algorithm is calculated, but it was wildly wrong for me. At first the tool indicated 5 days for 100 responses but I only received ~15 responses after 2 days. When I spoke with Customer Service (who are very helpful) they suggested expanding the respondent pool. Once I did, the tool indicated the survey would take 1 day, but only after ~10 days was the tool completed. It's a sufficient tool however beware of the estimated time-to-completion timelines.

originalText.text: I have used Pollfish a number of times and it's perfect for my needs (quick surveys with various questions types and the ability to use skip logic). I also like the ability to set up the survey so that when a respondent completes it, they loop right back to the beginning of the survey. This makes it easier for a respondent to take the survey multiple times if they need to.

originalText.text:
There are lots of reasons to like Pollfish, but one of my favorite things about them is their live chat support. Almost all websites have chat support. In most cases, it starts with a bot and you have to wade through question after question to get a live person - if you get one at all.

On Pollfish, not only are there no bots, but you never have to wait more than 1 or 2 minutes for a live person. And, they are incredibly knowledgable and get you the answers you need right away.

It sounds like that's not a big deal, but if you are mid-survey and you have a question, I can't tell you how wonderful it is knowing that you'll get an answer in minutes.

All you other websites...are you paying attention? This is how you do customer support.

originalText.text: Good platform for running large surveys in Canada or the USA. Very intuitive/easy to use. Customer support is very helpful and quick to respond to any issues.

text.text: Good platform for running large surveys in Canada or the USA. Very intuitive/easy to use. Customer support is very helpful and quick to respond to any issues.

originalText.text: The absolute worst survey site out there.  So many times I have taken my time and honestly completed a survey with them and then they disqualify me after I answer the final question.   That is thievery.
